name: nimbus/slam-toolbox-localization
description:
The Slam Toolbox package incorporates information from laser scanners in the form of a LaserScan message and TF transforms from odom->base link, and creates a map 2D map of a space. This package will allow you to fully serialize the data and pose-graph of the SLAM map to be reloaded to continue mapping, localize, merge, or otherwise manipulate.
This component provides an optimization-based localization mode built on the pose-graph from the Slam Toolbox package by Steve Macenski.
Source: git https://github.com/SteveMacenski/slam_toolbox.git 
License: LGPL

inputStreams.name: initial_pose
inputStreams.description: Subscriber to the /initialpose topic used by AMCL to relocalize to a position.

inputStreams.name: scan
inputStreams.description: Publishes a scan from the laser scanner

outputStreams.name: map
outputStreams.description: Occupancy grid representation of the pose-graph at map_update_interval frequency.
